travelerAnemo.name: Traveler
strengths: Elemental Skill and Burst offers crowd control.
Normal Attack combo can apply Anemo.
Elemental Skill and Burst can absorb and deal additional Elemental DMG.
6th Constellation can reduce enemy Elemental RES.
weaknesses: Unable to move when charging up Elemental Skill.

weapons.subDPS: Iron String, Festerin Desire, Sacrificial Sword
weapons.support: Iron String, Festerin Desire, Sacrificial Sword

normalAttack:
Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
elementalSkill:
Palm Vortex
Grasping the wind's might, you form a vortex of vacuum in your palm, causing continuous Anemo DMG to opponents in front of you. The vacuum vortex explodes when the skill duration ends, causing a greater amount of Anemo DMG over a larger area.

Elemental Absorption
If the vortex comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro elements, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.
elementalBurst:
Gust Surge
Guiding the path of the wind currents, you summon a forward-moving tornado that pulls objects and opponents towards itself, dealing Anemo DMG

Elemental Absorption
If the vortex comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro elements, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.
firsyAscensionPassive:
Slitting Wind
The last hit of a Normal Attack combo unleashes a wind blade, dealing 60% of ATK as Anemo DMG to all opponents in its path.
fourthAscensionPassive:
Second Wind
Palm Vortex kills regenerate 2% HP for 5s. This effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.c1:
Raging Vortex
Palm Vortec pulls in opponents and objects within a 5m radius.
constellations.c3:
Sweeping Gust
Increases the Level of Gust Surge by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.c4:
Cherishing Breezes
Reduces DMG taken while casting Palm by 10%.
constellations.c5:
Vortex Stellaris
Increases the Level of Palm Vortex by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.c6:
Intertwined Winds
Targets who take DMG from Gust Surge have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%.
If an Elemental Absorption occured, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.
